General.Name: Pure Foods Tasmania Ltd
General.Description: Pure Foods Tasmania Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the food business in Australia. The company offers pates, ready to eat meal trays, ice creams, and plant food products under Woodbridge Smokehouse, Tasmanian Pate, Daly Potato Co, Pure Tasmanian Seafood, Lauds Plant-Based Foods, The Cashew Creamery, and New Pastures. It also exports its products. Pure Foods Tasmania Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Mornington, Australia.
